Texts.Eng:
Born from raw Erchius, the greckan seek to understand their origins, and have a strong kinship with other Erchius lifeforms. High energy, resistant to damage but have weak immune systems. Exceptional when underground.
        
  Diet: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;: 
  Energy x^green;1.4^reset;
  Resist: +^green;15^reset;% Physical, +^green;12^reset;% Shadow, +^green;20^reset;% Poison
  Immune: Erchius Ghost, Poison

^orange;Environment^reset;:  
  On Moon-type biomes:
    +^green;15^reset;% Speed & Jump, Health x^green;1.15^reset;, and Defense x^green;1.1^reset;
  When underground:
    Health x^green;1.15^reset; and +^green;10^reset;% Jump

^orange;Weapons^reset;: 
  Wands and Staves: Damage x^green;1.3^reset; and +^green;10^reset;% Physical Resistance

^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
  Health x^red;0.7^reset;
  Resist: -^red;50^reset;% Electric
